column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Wildberry Pancakesand Cafe is a great place! The wait was not very long
column2: about 10-15 minutes on a lunch hour work day. I ordered the corned beef hash skillet and I couldn't even finish my entree!  It also came with a side of two eggs I ordered sunny side up as well as two delicious pancakes.  The pancakes were fluffy
column3: tasty and buttery.  They definitely add more vanilla and butter to their pancake batter unlike other breakfast places.  The location opened awhile ago near my office and I can't believe I haven't tried the place until now.  However
column4: I do usually try to make dishes like pancakes and eggs at home.
